ExportItemConfig.Query: SELECT c.id, c.`pt_id`, c.`code`, c.`description`, c.`amount`, c.`total_amount`, c.`fee`, c.`discount`, c.`integral`, c.`min_level`, c.`min_fee`, date_format(begin_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as begin_time, date_format(over_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as over_time, c.`allow_enable`, c.`need_bind`, lv.name as limit_levelName FROM pm_coupon c LEFT JOIN conf_member_level lv ON c.min_level = lv.id WHERE c.pt_id={partnerId} AND code LIKE '%{keyword}%' ORDER BY c.update_time DESC,c.create_time desc LIMIT {page_start},{page_size}
ExportItemConfig.Total: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM pm_coupon WHERE pt_id={partnerId} AND code LIKE '%{keyword}%'
